resources.string: 照片内存 - 球员的名字

Introduction:
This game uses the pictures stored on your phone. On the settings screen, you can choose how many pairs of pictures you would like to play with. For example: If the settings are for 32 cards, you must have at least 16 pictures on your phone in order to play. 

Instructions:
Select a card to flip it around. Select a second card to flip it around. If the two pictures match, they will disappear. If they do not match, they will both be flipped back after a few seconds delay. On the settings screen, you can choose the length of the delay. Once there are no more remaining cards, you will have won.
您没有足够的图片在您的手机。更改设置。
